verbs.description: [V: picking] out [ARG1: a new sofa sites] offer design advice for cheap hiring an interior designer is expensive and the chances of an hgtv host bursting through your doors are slim but several sites have made it more affordable to get design help without anyone ever stepping inside your home havenly wayfair and others are charging less than 100 a room to connect users with an interior designer who can pick out a sofa show you how to rearrange furniture or offer other design help the sites also make money if you buy the furniture and other goods that the designers recommend sara skirboll hgtv wayfair havenly new york design decorist
